db:abstract.db:para: The Qt Concurrent module contains functionality to support concurrent execution of program code.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Concurrent module contains functionality to support concurrent execution of program code.

db:listitem.db:para: The QtConcurrent namespace provides high-level APIs that make it possible to write multi-threaded programs without using low-level threading primitives.
The QTaskBuilder class is used for adjusting task parameters.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The Qt Concurrent page contains information about how to use the module.
